attributes.action: Scrap the new Olympic logo and have the public money refunded
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The new Olympic logo is an affront to the nation.  We need a new logo, or at least a return to the old one.

Furthermore the obscene amount of money that has been paid to manufacture this eyesore should be refunded by the idiots that created it.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
